The first tutor in the list is assumed to be the "Main Tutor". Up to 3 per roll group.

Grade scales are used through the Assess modules to control what grades can be entered into the system. Editing some of the inbuilt scales can impact other areas of the system: it is advised to take a backup of the entire system before doing this.
This is the lowest grade a student can get without being unsatisfactory.
Brief description of how scale is used.
Does this scale use only numeric grades? Note, grade "Incomplete" is exempt.
The default grade value for the scale must be unique. Repeated at "%{name}""
Brief description of assessment and how it is used.
Should the student record include the option of a file upload?
Grade scale used to control values that can be assigned.
Year groups to which this field is relevant.
Categories must be created in the External Assessment for use in the field. If you need a new category for this assessment field, add a new category using the add category button.
